rows.label: qst100808_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, why didn't you come
and help me?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought we were buddies! That means
you're supposed to come and give me a
hand if I'm in a tough spot!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0003
rows.name: B-but there was nothing I could do!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0004
rows.name:
You know I'm scared of high places,
cliffs, slippy surfaces! You know full
well!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0005
rows.name:
If you're gonna wander off somewhere,
you need to check with me first! Did
you think of that?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0006
rows.name:
You could have just got a grip and
come over to help! Did that occur to
you?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0007
rows.name:
Honestly, Kapha! We're out here in
search of adventure! We'll never have
any if you're scared of everything!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0008
rows.name: Why...you...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0201
rows.name: How shall we get them to calm down?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0202
rows.name: Tell them they complement each other.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0203
rows.name: Tell them to stop being so silly.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0301
rows.name:
We compensate for each other's
shortcomings?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0302
rows.name:
Hmmm. Well, I'm terrible at searching
for stuff, but I'm good in a fight, that's
for sure.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0303
rows.name:
Shal blazes a trail up ahead and
finds new places that I've never seen,
but she waits for me.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0304
rows.name:
I mean, I'm a little slow...but I do my
best to catch up.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0305
rows.name: Kapha...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0306
rows.name:
I guess you're right. We did promise
each other that we'd find amazing
places together...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0307
rows.name: Okay! I'll leave the rear guard to you!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0308
rows.name:
And I'll scout ahead to look for the
routes with the safest footing!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0401
rows.name:
If you lot hadn't have turned up, I
reckon I'd have ended up as a
monster's lunch!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0402
rows.name:
M-Monster? There were monsters when
you went to get the Healing Herb?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0403
rows.name: Yes...there were...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0404
rows.name:
So if these people hadn't helped you,
you'd have... Gulp!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0405
rows.name:
I'm sorry, Kapha... I guess I was a little
thoughtless.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0406
rows.name:
You're just a bit too gung-ho.
And I'm too much of a scaredy-cat.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0407
rows.name:
Maybe we should tell each other when
our shortcomings start to be a problem!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0501
rows.name: Thanks for helping us, guys.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0502
rows.name: Sorry for putting you to all that bother.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0503
rows.name:
Thanks for helping me get that
Healing Herb! The doctor will be
really grateful!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0504
rows.name:
It's been a wake-up call for us, as well.
I think we're going to make an effort to
cooperate more from now on.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0505
rows.name:
Here, we can't let you go without
giving you a little something.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0506
rows.name: Well, mind how you go!
